Content:: Chandrasiri Gajadeera (26 February 1946 – 6 September 2019) [1] was a Sri Lankan politician,[2] a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka and Minister of Rehabilitation[3] and Prisons.[4]  This article about a politician from Southern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
